}}'''''Minecraft Idea a Day''''' is a ''Minecraft'' flip book, giving daily suggestions and techniques for building.

== Synopsis ==
{{quote|
'''Flip the page and discover a new ''Minecraft'' build idea to inspire you each day!'''

Get creative with 150 awesome ''Minecraft'' builds, from secret bases, cute [[Animal|animals]], and dream homes to supersized landmarks, [[mob]] builds and much more!

The stand-up, spiral-bound format is perfect for displaying next to your screen and enjoying with family and friends, as you find inspiration for your next brilliant build.
